description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Toy Invasion. Don't throw your toys out your cot, Shoot them out. A twin stick Turret Defense. It's simple, Survive the waves of Toys flying at you. Share a Turret with a Friend and blast them Toys all to smithereens.
description.short: Toy Invasion. Don't throw your toys out your cot, Shoot them out. A twin stick Turret Defense. It's simple, Survive the waves of Toys flying at you. Share a Turret with a Friend and blast them Toys all to smithereens.
